entry.title: For Just This Moment (Let Me Have It with You)
entry.summary:
Author: odaisybluesz

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,071Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 26

Summary: Clark muttered, and lowered his face into Bruce's shoulder, letting himself take in Bruce's presence. Bruce spoke again, and he kept his gaze directed forward as he stared mindlessly at the streets below, ".. I should move. It's been too quiet here." "I haven't seen you since this morning. Can you stay for just another moment?" Clark complained and he unconsciously wrapped himself tighter around Bruce, ignoring the hard armor against him. Bruce paused and let his brain ramble for a moment. There was no point to this, and he was just wasting time for even considering arguing against Superman. However..what makes for a better night than getting dicked down on a roof by your boyfriend?

entry.summary:
Author: sweethoneysuckle (blea_my)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,140Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 227

Summary: College Au- Superbat Clark Kent had the perfect university life—top grades, a steady spot as campus journalist, good friends, and even a girlfriend. Everything was in place until Bruce Wayne transferred in from an elite school,a rich, reckless brat with an insufferably smug, Bruce seems determined to unravel Clark’s perfectly ordered world and seems to live just to get under Clark’s skin… and maybe, under it all, into his world.

entry.title: The Outer Layers
entry.summary:
Author: aerey

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,669Chapters: 7/9Kudos: 55

Summary: Bruce Wayne's life is a perfect, messy struggle. Raising five kids is no easy feat, but with the constant support from his found family (especially Alfred), they've been able to make do. However, Bruce is still, at the end of the day, alone. As CEO of Wayne Enterprises, coming home to an empty bed (except for when one of his kids has a nightmare) after a long day is something he tries not to think about too hard. It all changes when at the beginning of Dick's last and Jason's first year of high school when a new science teacher appears. Clark Kent is like no one Bruce has ever met and has a smile that could light up a dark room. However, as Bruce tries to get to know the man better, the shadows they both carry become evident. Some are old scars smoothed over and some are fresh wounds, waiting to fester and burst. The two are hopeless and awful at communicating, but some things are worth the effort, right?

entry.title: Every Inch of You
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,210Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 123

Summary: "This is a love story." | "This is a detective story"When Clark Kent follows a story into Gotham, he doesn’t expect to find himself face-to-face with the city’s true guardian: a bat with fangs, claws, and a half-feral silhouette in the shadows. Suspicious, circling him like prey, Batman tests every ounce of Clark’s resolve—only for Clark’s clumsy optimism to slip through anyway (“What the hay, are those fangs?”).Between the silk shawls and champagne smiles of Bruce Wayne, Gotham’s Pretty Boy Playboy, and the smudged-eyeliner hunger of the Bat with Fangs, Clark finds himself drawn to both—the golden boy in the sun and the monster in the dark. He doesn’t break Bruce’s walls with force, but with patience, reverence, and devotion.The monster who refuses to hurt the one he loves, and the hero who would even offer his own blood to keep him alive.

entry.title: Never, Never a frown
entry.summary:
Author: silly_sollie

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,566Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 18

Summary: He stared at her, uncomprehending. "Was? What do you mean, 'was'? Did they suffer the same fate? Did they pay for what they did?" He gestured frantically with his hands, a desperate plea for her to continue. Martha shook her head slowly, a grim, defeated expression settling on her face. "No, Clark, that's not what I mean. They… they still exist to this day. Thriving, even. More powerful than ever, by some accounts." She sighed, a deep, shuddering sound that spoke of decades of suppressed fear. She averted her gaze, turning her head to stare out the window, at the rolling hills of their quiet farm, as if looking for solace in the familiar landscape, before finally muttering out the name. "Gotham."

entry.title: call your mom
entry.summary:
Author: psycheion

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,024Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 97

Summary: The red fabric pooled in his hands, strong but unbelievably soft. Bruce itched to know what it was made out of. Would the fibers match anything on Earth? What would it look like under a microscope? Was it flame retardant? Could it be torn or damaged? How was it able to stop bullets and still be this... soft?"It was my baby blanket." Clark hummed.Bruce stopped breathing.It transformed from the cape of the strongest man on the planet into an infant's swaddle; a relic of a dead world, a soft token of a mother's love that was strong enough to keep her baby safe thirty-three years later. Bruce hadn't cried in almost eighteen years, but tonight, he was about to break that streak.

entry.title: Kryptonian Reproduction, an Observation
entry.summary:
Author: Winkaku

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,775Chapters: 17/17Kudos: 910

Summary: They'd been caught in each others orbit for some time now and, quite frankly, Clark should have seen this coming. Crazy was part and parcel to Gotham after all... let alone his own life.A series of PWP vignettes wherein the plot is entirely background.AKA: that time I tried to make a kinky science fic that turned into a writing challenge that turned into a crazy romp with associated art pieces. Fun was had by all.
